summary: This document certifies that the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. is in good standing as a non-profit corporation in the Virgin Islands. It details the filing and incorporation dates, confirming the corporation's legal status.

persons.name: Denise Joannes
persons.context: Denise Joannes is identified as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks, who issued the certification of good standing for the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: J. Epstein is mentioned as the founder of the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc., which is the subject of the certification.

connections.description: Denise Joannes, as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks, oversees the certification process for corporations like the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc.

events.title: Filing of Articles of Incorporation
events.description: The J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. filed its Articles of Incorporation.

events.title: Issuance of Certificate of Incorporation
events.description: A Certificate of Incorporation was issued by the Lieutenant Governor authorizing the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. to conduct business.

keyFacts: The J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. was incorporated on June 15, 2000.
The corporation received its Certificate of Incorporation on July 14, 2000.
Denise Joannes is the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks who certified the corporation's good standing.
